name: jregexer
description: A regex based parsing combinator library for JavaScript

scripts.test: npm run build && export UEBLUEPRINT_TEST_SERVER_PORT=8181 && npx concurrently -k "http-server -s -p $UEBLUEPRINT_TEST_SERVER_PORT" "npx cypress run --env UEBLUEPRINT_TEST_SERVER_PORT=8181"
scripts.cypress: export UEBLUEPRINT_TEST_SERVER_PORT=8181 && npx concurrently -k "http-server -c-1 -p $UEBLUEPRINT_TEST_SERVER_PORT" "npx cypress open --env UEBLUEPRINT_TEST_SERVER_PORT=8181"

author: barsdeveloper
